title: Response to comment on: Could internal limiting membrane peeling before Voretigen Neparvovec-ryzl subretinal injection prevent focal chorioretinal atrophy?
content:
Publication date: 15 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 19

Author(s): Lea Dormegny, Fouzia Studer, Arnaud Sauer, Laurent Ballonzoli, Claude Speeg-Schatz, Tristan Bourcier, Helene Dollfus, David Gaucher
